reviewText: My students love these videos, and they learn more than they do with any other method of vocabulary instruction, but I was a little disappointed in this one because it uses the term "pissed off" in the very first video.  I know these are made for high school students, but my district is very strict about language.  However, when I wrote to the company about my disappointment, they immediately made amends. I am very impressed by this company.
